WEEKLY ROUNDUP (JULY 22-28, 2024)
Share:
As we turn the calendar to August, it's time to reflect on the incredible progress and take a look at what we've achieved this week:
Funding Milestone: Strengthening Our Market-Making Fund
We are thrilled to announce that we have successfully raised an additional $5,000 for our market-making fund. This significant milestone will enhance our liquidity and support our ongoing efforts to stabilize and grow our token's market presence. The additional funds will allow us to explore new opportunities and build a more robust financial foundation for our community.
Website Enhancements: Preparing for the Gem Viewer Launch
Our team has been hard at work updating our website in anticipation of the much-anticipated Gem Viewer launch. These enhancements are designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly experience for our community, ensuring that you can easily access and explore the new features we've implemented. The updated website reflects our commitment to delivering innovative solutions and an exceptional user experience.
Audit Corrections: Ensuring Accuracy and Transparency
In our ongoing commitment to transparency and accuracy, we've corrected incorrect contract audit information on two platforms. We understand the importance of providing accurate data and have taken swift action to resolve these issues. Our team is dedicated to maintaining the highest standards of integrity and trust, ensuring our community has access to reliable information.
Gem Fighter Guide: A Comprehensive Resource for Our Community
We are excited to announce the release of our comprehensive PDF guide for Gem Fighter NFTs. This guide is designed to help our community navigate the exciting world of Gem Fighter NFTs, providing valuable insights and tips for maximizing your experience. Whether you're a seasoned NFT enthusiast or new to the space, our guide offers something for everyone.
Platform Updates: Enhancing Visibility and Reach
This week, we updated the $HODLX listings on CoinScope and CyberScope, improving our visibility and reach within the cryptocurrency community. These updates are part of our ongoing efforts to ensure our token is accurately represented across all platforms, providing potential investors with the information they need to make informed decisions.
Roadmap Additions: Sharing Our Vision for the Future
We have also added our complete roadmap to our CoinMarketCap page, providing our community with a clear view of our future plans and objectives. Our roadmap outlines the exciting projects and initiatives we have in store, showcasing our commitment to growth and innovation. By sharing our vision, we aim to foster transparency and build trust with our community.
Team and Advisor Updates: Strengthening Our Leadership
In addition to our roadmap, we have updated our CoinMarketCap page with information about our team, investors, and advisors. We believe that a strong leadership team is essential for achieving our goals, and we are proud to highlight the talented individuals driving our success. Our team's expertise and dedication are key to our continued growth and innovation.
Play-to-Earn Enhancements: Improving the User Experience
Our play-to-earn environment has received significant enhancements this week, aimed at providing a more enjoyable and rewarding experience for our users. We are committed to continuously improving our platform, ensuring that our community has access to cutting-edge features and opportunities to earn rewards while playing their favorite games.
Contract Upgrades: Reducing Fees for Our Community
We have successfully implemented contract upgrades to lower claim and reinvestment fees, making our platform more accessible and cost-effective for our users. These upgrades are part of our ongoing efforts to enhance the value we provide to our community, ensuring that our platform remains competitive and user-friendly.
Advertising and Promotions: Expanding Our Reach
Our marketing team has been busy running successful advertising campaigns on X, as well as publishing new articles on Medium. These efforts are designed to expand our reach and engage with a broader audience, increasing awareness of our platform and its offerings. We are dedicated to building a strong community and look forward to welcoming new members to our ecosystem.
Social Media Engagement: Connecting with Our Community
Finally, our social media team has been actively engaging with our community through various channels, sharing updates, insights, and exciting news. We value the feedback and support of our community and are committed to maintaining an open line of communication. Your input is invaluable as we continue to innovate and grow our platform.
Looking Ahead: What's Next for Our Team
As we move forward into August, our focus will be on launching the Gem Fighter feature and continuing to enhance our play-to-earn environment. We are also working diligently to launch the HODL app on iOS, expand our market-making fund, and roll out a new series of marketing initiatives. We are excited about the future and look forward to sharing more updates with you in the coming weeks.
Thank you for your continued support and trust in our vision. Together, we are building a vibrant and thriving community. Stay tuned for more exciting developments as we continue on this incredible journey!

Even during the holiday season, the HODL team is making significant strides. Here’s a detailed look at our recent achievements and what's ahead:
Weekly Highlights
Faster API for Gemstone Viewer
We've developed a faster API for our upcoming gemstone viewer, ensuring a smoother, more efficient experience for users.
New Promo Graphics Workshops
Our designers have been hard at work in workshops creating new promotional graphics to enhance our marketing efforts and attract more attention to our platform.
New Game Features for Gem Fighter
We’ve added exciting new features to Gem Fighter, enriching the gameplay and keeping our community engaged.
BNB Reward Pool Top-Ups
Regular top-ups were made to the BNB reward pool throughout the month, ensuring our community continues to receive rewards.
Extensive Gemstone Viewer Testing
Extensive testing of the gemstone viewer has been conducted to ensure it meets our high standards before its official launch.
Fundraising for Buybacks and Market Making
We successfully raised $20,000 for buybacks and market making (MM) of $HODL, reinforcing our commitment to the token's stability and growth.
Play-to-Earn Seasons
We completed and paid out two Play-to-Earn (P2E) seasons and launched new ones, providing continuous opportunities for our community to earn rewards.
Fresh Archive of Gem Fighter Promo Art
A new archive of promotional art for Gem Fighter has been completed, ready to be utilized across our marketing channels.
Updated $HODL Listing Sites
We’ve updated several $HODL listing sites with new information, ensuring accuracy and attracting potential investors.
Improved Google Rankings
Our efforts to improve our Google ranking for 'HODL' have been successful, increasing our online visibility.
Lower Claim Fees with Contract Upgrades
We’ve upgraded our contract to lower claim fees, making it more user-friendly and cost-effective for our community.
Advertising on X
Successful advertising campaigns on X have helped draw in new users and increase our platform’s visibility.
Strategic Development
We are continuously developing new strategies to take HODL to the next level.
Content and Promotions
CoinMarketCap Promotions:
Active promotions are increasing our visibility and attracting new users.
Content Publications:
Our last roundup was published across multiple platforms, alongside a new CoinMarketCap article, new Medium articles, and blog updates.
Social Media Activity:
A substantial volume of social media posts has kept our community informed and engaged.
Looking Ahead
This week, we are thrilled to announce the launch of our incredible Gem Fighter NFT gemstone viewer! We are also pushing hard on the development of our Gem Fighter game and formulating strategic plans for marketing and growth. HODL is ready for the Bull Run!
Stay connected and watch for more exciting updates from the HODL team!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (July 8-14, 2024)
Share:
Welcome to this week's HODL Roundup! Despite some team members taking well-deserved vacations, we’ve still made significant progress. Here's a detailed look at what we’ve achieved over the past week in HODL land:
Weekly Highlights
New Play-to-Earn Seasons Launched
We’re excited to announce the launch of all-new Play-to-Earn (P2E) seasons. These fresh seasons are designed to keep our community engaged and motivated, offering new opportunities to earn rewards.
$HODL Buy Bot Upgrades
Our $HODL buy bot settings have been upgraded to enhance transaction efficiency and reliability. These improvements ensure a smoother and more seamless experience for all users.
Social Media Expansion
We’ve created 50 new social media assets for Gem Fighter. These assets will help boost our online presence and attract more attention to our platform, showcasing the excitement and innovation behind Gem Fighter.
Strategic Planning and Market Research
Our team conducted extensive strategy planning sessions and market research this week. These efforts are crucial for shaping our future direction and ensuring that our strategies are backed by solid market data.
Gem Viewer System Upgrades
Significant upgrades have been made to our gem viewer system. These improvements are part of our preparation for its upcoming launch, focusing on optimization to deliver the best possible user experience.
Security Enhancements
We’ve implemented security updates to our P2E system, reinforcing our commitment to providing a safe and secure environment for all participants.
Promotions and Content Updates
CoinMarketCap Promotions:
We’ve been actively promoting on CoinMarketCap to increase our visibility and attract new users.
Content Publications:
This week saw the publication of our last roundup, a new article on CoinMarketCap, new Medium articles, and updates to our blog on the HODL website.
Social Media Activity:
Our team has been busy with a substantial volume of social media posts, keeping our community informed and engaged.
Looking Ahead
Next week promises to be just as exciting! We’re hoping to launch our incredible gemstone viewer for Gem Fighter NFTs and are working tirelessly to get the HODL app listed in the iOS store. Additionally, we are formulating exciting plans to take HODL to the next stage, with a strong focus on completing our amazing Gem Fighter game.
Stay tuned for more updates and keep an eye out for our upcoming launches and announcements.

Weekly Roundup: July 1-7, 2024
Share:
Welcome to the HODL Weekly Update! Despite the market's ups and downs, our team remains committed to pushing our project forward. Here’s a comprehensive look at what we’ve achieved this week and what’s coming next.
Weekly Highlights
New Promotional Assets
This week, we unveiled new promotional materials for both Gem Fighter and the HODL app. These assets are designed to capture attention and engage our audience, helping to spread the word about our exciting platforms.
Token Listings Updated
We’ve successfully updated $HODL token listings on five different platforms. These updates are crucial for providing accurate information to potential investors and making it easier for them to discover and invest in $HODL.
Enhancements to Play-to-Earn (P2E)
To improve user experience, we’ve added new Play-to-Earn terms and FAQs to our website. This ensures our community has clear and accessible information about how to participate. Additionally, we’ve distributed Play-to-Earn prizes to all winners, demonstrating our commitment to rewarding our dedicated participants.
Significant Development Progress
Our development team has made notable strides this week:
We’ve continued enhancing our Play-to-Earn environment, making it more engaging and enjoyable for users.
The gemstone viewer, a feature set to add significant value, is progressing well.
A critical contract upgrade was implemented to fix a reinvestment bug, ensuring smoother and more reliable operations for our users.
Securing New Domains and Expanding Platforms
We’re excited to announce the acquisition of the /hodl domain on Yedi (formerly known as MoonScan). This strategic move will strengthen our online presence and make it easier for users to access our resources.
Launch of New P2E Seasons and Prizes
We’ve launched new seasons and prizes for our Play-to-Earn participants, keeping the gameplay fresh and exciting. These updates are designed to motivate and engage our community, encouraging continued participation.
Advertising and Broad Content Distribution
Our advertising campaigns on X have been successful in attracting new users and increasing visibility. Additionally, we’ve published our last roundup across multiple platforms, ensuring our community stays well-informed about our latest developments.
Content Creation and Social Media Engagement
Our content team has been hard at work:
New articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium provide deep insights into our project.
We’ve updated our blog with the latest news and developments.
A significant volume of social media posts has kept our community engaged and informed.
Looking Ahead
As we edge closer to the anticipated bull run, we remain focused on building and promoting our platform. The coming weeks promise more exciting updates and developments. Stay tuned!

Weekly Roundup: Jun 24–30, 2024
Share:
Hello HODL community!
As we wrap up another eventful week, we're excited to share the significant strides we've made from June 24 to June 30, 2024. Our team has been hard at work on multiple fronts, pushing forward with our mission to create a robust and thriving ecosystem. Here's a detailed breakdown of our progress:
Fixes and Upgrades
We've focused on enhancing our core platforms to ensure a seamless experience for our users:
App, Website, and Dashboard Improvements:
We made several crucial fixes and enhancements to our app, website, and dashboard. These updates are aimed at improving user experience, boosting performance, and adding new features.
Contract Upgrade:
To reduce transaction fees for our community, we upgraded our contract. This change is designed to make transactions more cost-effective and efficient.
Strategic Initiatives
In our ongoing efforts to strengthen our market presence and partnerships:
Token Listing Site Updates:
We contacted 20 token listing sites to ensure they have the latest information about $HODL. This step is crucial for maintaining accurate and up-to-date listings, helping potential investors find reliable data.
Recovery of Tokens from CEXs:
We successfully recovered 1 Trillion tokens from old centralized exchanges (CEXs). This recovery is a significant milestone in our efforts to consolidate our token supply and enhance liquidity.
Claim Process for CEX Holders:
We launched a streamlined claim process for holders who had tokens on these old exchanges, ensuring they can access their assets without hassle.
New Partnership:
We formed a strategic partnership with a leading token listing site. This collaboration will help us reach a broader audience and enhance our visibility in the crypto space.
Development Progress
Our development team has been making significant progress on various projects:
P2E Environment Development:
We continued to advance our Play-to-Earn (P2E) environment, laying the groundwork for an engaging and rewarding gaming experience for our users.
$HODL Listings:
We successfully listed $HODL on three new token listing platforms, expanding our reach and accessibility.
3D Gem Viewer for Gem Fighter NFTs:
Our team built a cutting-edge 3D gem viewer for Gem Fighter NFTs. This feature allows users to view their NFTs in stunning detail, enhancing their overall experience.
Media and Community Engagement
We’ve been active in engaging with our community and the broader crypto world:
Press Releases:
We published several press releases, including notable features on Yahoo! Finance. These releases help us communicate our achievements and plans to a wider audience.
Community Raids:
Our dedicated community participated in several raids, driving engagement and spreading the word about $HODL.
$HODL Trending:
We were thrilled to see $HODL trending #1 on Crypto.com. This milestone reflects the growing interest and support from the crypto community.
Website Updates:
We made significant updates to our website menu, adding new items to improve navigation and user experience.
Articles and Blog Posts:
We published detailed articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium, along with a new blog post on our website. These publications provide valuable insights and updates about our projects and plans.
Social Media Activity:
Our team has been actively posting on social media, maintaining a high volume of informative and engaging content.
Looking Ahead
There’s a lot to look forward to as we continue to develop and innovate:
Gemstone Viewer for Gem Fighter NFT Holders:
We're developing a new gemstone viewer for our Gem Fighter NFT holders, enhancing the way users interact with their NFTs.
Upcoming HODL App for iOS:
Our team is working on the HODL app for iOS, which will bring our platform to even more users.
New Games and Features:
We're excited to announce ongoing development of the Gem Fighter game and a poker game, adding more fun and engagement to our ecosystem.
Anticipated Bull Run:
As retailers return to crypto, we anticipate a bullish market ahead. Combined with our ongoing developments, there's a lot to be optimistic about.
Thank you for being a part of our vibrant community. Your support and engagement drive us forward. Let's continue to achieve great things together!

WEEKLY HODL ROUNDUP (Jun 17–23, 2024)
Share:
Hello HODL Community! We've been working diligently this week to polish our token listings and enhance our play-to-earn games based on your feedback. Our marketing efforts are ramping up as we prepare for the anticipated bull run. Here's a comprehensive look at our recent activities and accomplishments:
Weekly Highlights
Full Listing on CoinScope
We successfully listed $HODL in full on CoinScope, ensuring all information is accurate and up-to-date for our community and potential investors.
CoinScope KYC and Certification
Completed KYC with CoinScope and published the certificate, enhancing our credibility and transparency.
Community Voting Efforts
Collaborated with our community to drive votes on listing sites, improving our visibility and rankings across multiple platforms.
Partnership with CryptoGugu
Partnered with CryptoGugu and listed $HODL as a featured token, significantly expanding our reach and attracting new investors to our ecosystem.
CoinMarketCap Supply Verification
Successfully completed supply verification on CoinMarketCap and earned the checkmark, confirming the accuracy of our supply data.
Full Listing on CryptoGugu
Listed $HODL token on CryptoGugu with comprehensive details, providing clear and detailed information to potential investors.
CoinMarketCap Page Enhancements
Added detailed team and roadmap information to our CoinMarketCap page, showcasing our project's vision and progress to the broader crypto community.
Crypto Slash Difficulty Update
Updated the difficulty level in Crypto Slash based on valuable user feedback, improving the overall gaming experience.
AMA on Binance Live
Conducted an engaging AMA on Binance Live, where we shared our latest updates and answered questions from our community.
Review of Designer Artwork
Reviewed the latest artwork from our talented designers to finalize new promotional posts and visuals for upcoming campaigns.
Verified Listing on ApeSpace
Successfully listed on ApeSpace with full verification, ensuring accurate representation and increased trustworthiness.
DEXView KYC Update
Updated our KYC on DEXView, which significantly boosted our score and enhanced our credibility on the platform.
Reddit Page Overhaul
Revamped our Reddit page with new panels and fresh content, making it more informative and engaging for our community members and visitors.
KYC Report Publication
Added our KYC report to various platforms, including our official website (hodltoken.net), further promoting transparency.
Latest Roundup on X
Published the latest roundup as an article on X, keeping our followers well-informed and engaged with our ongoing developments.
Website Menu Enhancements
Updated and added new links to our website menu, improving overall navigation and user accessibility.
Consistent Content and Social Media Updates
Published last week’s roundup across all platforms, a new CoinMarketCap article, new Medium articles, and an updated blog post on the HODL website. We maintained robust social media activity to keep the community informed and engaged.
Looking Ahead
Our project is fantastically positioned to enter the bull run. Our current focus is on getting the iOS app listed, further developing our play-to-earn ecosystem, and maximizing our reach and awareness for HODL. Exciting times ahead!
Thank you for being part of the HODL journey. Let’s continue to build and grow together!

Unleashing the Power of HODL: A Game-Changing Passive Income Platform on Binance Smart Chain
Share:
Whether you're a seasoned investor or new to the world of cryptocurrencies, HODL offers a comprehensive ecosystem to generate substantial returns while embracing the power of long-term holding.
HODL Token:
A Rewarding Experience HODL introduces the $HODL token, the ultimate reward token designed to incentivize and reward its holders. With 2% reflections on every transaction, $HODL holders receive BNB rewards based on their ownership percentage. The burn lottery adds an exciting element to the mix, allowing holders to win tokens and further enhancing scarcity and value appreciation.
Liquidity Pool and Reinvestment Bonuses:
Every $HODL transaction triggers the conversion of 1.5% into LP tokens, adding to the PancakeSwap liquidity pool. This mechanism enhances liquidity and stability in the market. Additionally, HODL offers reinvestment bonuses, providing users with a tax-free 2.5% bonus in $HODL when they choose to reinvest. Reinvesting also grants early claim privileges for 100% reinvestments.
HODL Stack:
Maximizing Returns HODL Stack is an innovative feature that allows users to stack their rewards and earn higher returns while avoiding gas fees. With a maximum stacking amount of 0.1 BNB, investors of all sizes can participate. To protect investors from large sell-offs, HODL implements a maximum sell restriction per address per 24 hours, ensuring a stable and sustainable environment.
Stable Rewards:
Consistency in Earnings One of the standout features of HODL is its commitment to stable rewards. The adjustable 'cap' ensures consistent BNB reward payouts, even during periods of lower volume. Rewards accumulate during high-volume periods, providing users with sustainable long-term earnings and stability.
HODL Dashboard:
Insights at Your Fingertips The HODL dashboard, known as $HODL Dash, offers users a comprehensive overview of their investments. Through this user-friendly interface, investors can access monthly and annual reward and reflection forecasts, transaction histories, and monitor project wallets. The HODL mobile app further enhances convenience by providing real-time management and updates on the go.
HODLX Token and NFTs:
Expanding Opportunities HODLX serves as the staking and farming token within the HODL ecosystem. By staking HODLX, users can earn not only $HODL and $HODLX but also HODL Hands NFTs. Additionally, yield farming in the HODLX/BUSD pair offers additional token rewards. Swapping tokens for discounted NFTs unlocks unique benefits and participation in the thriving NFT ecosystem.
HODL Hands NFTs:
Unlocking Exclusive Perks HODL Hands NFTs provide users with exclusive perks and benefits. Staking these NFTs enables users to earn $HODL or $HODLX, further enhancing their earning potential. Swapping tokens for NFTs allows users to participate in the dynamic NFT ecosystem while contributing to the overall growth of the platform.
HODL Games:
Fun and Rewards HODL is not just about investments and NFTs; it also offers free-to-play games that provide entertainment and earning opportunities. The project is developing a side-scrolling space-based shoot 'em up game, where players engage in thrilling gameplay and receive $HODL and $HODLX rewards. HODL Games represents the perfect blend of play-to-earn gaming and the crypto revolution.
HODL's all-in-one passive income platform on the Binance Smart Chain offers a groundbreaking opportunity to generate substantial returns in the crypto market. With innovative tokenomics, a vibrant NFT ecosystem, and exciting play-to-earn gaming, HODL empowers individuals to take control of their financial future. Join the HODL community, embrace the power of long-term holding, and unlock your earning potential in the world of cryptocurrencies.

Decoding HODL: The Unexpected Force that Transformed Cryptocurrency Investing and Empowered a Generation
Share:
The world of cryptocurrency is filled with distinct terms and expressions that capture its innovative spirit. Among them, "HODL" stands out as a term that embodies the core of cryptocurrency investing and has significantly influenced the community. By delving into the origins, psychological aspects, and broader implications of HODL, we can grasp its role in shaping the cryptocurrency landscape and empowering investors.
The Genesis of HODL
The term "HODL" first appeared in 2013 when a Bitcoin forum user inadvertently misspelled the word "hold." The community swiftly adopted it as an acronym for "Hold On for Dear Life," encapsulating the mindset of long-term crypto investors. Today, the term is widely used to describe the practice of retaining one's cryptocurrency assets, regardless of market ups and downs.
HODL and Market Dynamics
Cryptocurrency markets are known for their extreme volatility. For numerous investors, HODL signifies a tactical approach to managing their assets amid market fluctuations. By maintaining their investments through market peaks and valleys, HODLers seek to gain the long-term advantages of their chosen cryptocurrencies.
The Psychology behind HODL
The prominence of HODL within the crypto community can be partly attributed to human psychology. Research indicates that people are more inclined to retain assets when they perceive their value as uncertain or volatile. HODLing can be viewed as a manifestation of anchoring bias, where investors cling to their initial assessments of an asset's worth, despite shifting market conditions.
The HODL Token and Its Influence on Cryptocurrency Development
The HODL concept has left its mark on the growth and evolution of cryptocurrency projects. The HODL token, launched on the Binance Smart Chain, exemplifies a project that embraces the HODL philosophy. By offering rewards to token holders and promoting long-term investments, the HODL token cultivates a sense of community and allegiance among its investors, contributing to the project's stability and overall value.
HODL as a Cultural Movement
The term HODL has evolved beyond its initial meaning, transforming it into a cultural movement that extends beyond the financial realm. It symbolizes resilience and unwavering belief in the potential of cryptocurrencies. As a meme, HODL has the capacity to convey intricate ideas in an accessible and straightforward manner, capturing the spirit of the crypto community.
As the cryptocurrency domain continues to progress, HODL stands as a potent emblem of the mindset and culture propelling this inventive financial sector. By scrutinizing its origins, psychological foundations, and broader ramifications, we can glean valuable insights into the factors that mold the ever-changing landscape of cryptocurrency investing. The HODL token exemplifies the expanding influence of this idea, further cementing its position in the world of digital assets.

Bull Traps in Crypto: How to Identify and Avoid Them with DCA and HODL Strategies
Share:
The world of cryptocurrency can be both exciting and treacherous. Among the many potential pitfalls is the "
bull trap
," a deceptive pattern that can lead to significant financial loss. This article will explore what a bull trap is, how to identify one, and how to avoid falling victim to it by employing Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) and Hold On for Dear Life (HODL) strategies.
Defining a Bull Trap
A bull trap occurs when an asset, such as a cryptocurrency, appears to be entering a bullish phase, prompting investors to buy in anticipation of continued price growth. However, this rally is short-lived, and the price soon reverses, often plunging lower than before the upward movement began. Investors who bought into the bull trap are left with losses as the value of their investment drops.
Causes of Bull Traps
Several factors can contribute to the formation of a bull trap. These include:
Market manipulation: Large investors, or "whales," may artificially inflate the price of a cryptocurrency to create a false sense of optimism before selling off their holdings, causing the price to plummet.
FOMO: Fear of Missing Out can lead to inexperienced investors buying into a temporary price increase without proper analysis, mistakenly believing they are catching the beginning of a long-term trend.
Technical factors: Price levels that were previously resistance or support can create psychological barriers for traders, causing them to buy or sell at specific points, which may result in a bull trap.
Identifying Bull Traps
To protect yourself from falling into a bull trap, you must be able to identify one. Here are some indicators to look out for:
Volume: A genuine breakout is usually accompanied by an increase in trading volume. A low trading volume during a price increase may indicate a bull trap.
Resistance levels: If a cryptocurrency struggles to break through a specific resistance level, it could be a sign of a bull trap.
Overbought conditions: When technical indicators, such as the Relative Strength Index (RSI), suggest an asset is overbought, it may be an indication that a reversal is imminent.
Avoiding Bull Traps with DCA and HODL
To minimize the risks associated with bull traps, consider implementing the following strategies:
Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): This approach involves investing a fixed amount of money at regular intervals, regardless of the asset's price. DCA helps to spread your investment over time, reducing the impact of short-term price fluctuations and bull traps. By averaging out your entry points, you lower the risk of buying in at the peak of a bull trap.
Hold On for Dear Life (HODL): The HODL strategy is based on the idea that long-term investments in solid projects will yield positive returns, even if the market experiences short-term setbacks. By adopting a HODL mindset, you resist the temptation to panic sell during a bull trap and instead focus on the potential long-term growth of your investment.
Conclusion
In the volatile world of cryptocurrencies, bull traps can lead to significant financial loss for unsuspecting investors. To protect yourself, it is crucial to understand what a bull trap is, how to identify one, and how to avoid them using DCA and HODL strategies. By staying informed and adopting a disciplined investment approach, you can better navigate the crypto market and enhance your chances of long-term success.

Impermanent Loss: Understanding the Risks and Rewards of Liquidity Provision in Decentralized Exchanges
Share:
Impermanent loss is a phenomenon that occurs in automated market maker (AMM) based decentralized exchanges (DEXs), and it can cause significant losses to liquidity providers (LPs). In simple terms, impermanent loss occurs when the price of a token changes dramatically in relation to another token in a liquidity pool. The result is that the LPs suffer a loss in value, and they end up with fewer tokens than they started with, even though the liquidity pool may have gained trading fees.
How Impermanent Loss Happens
To understand impermanent loss, you first need to understand how liquidity pools work. In a liquidity pool, LPs deposit two types of tokens in equal proportions, and the exchange rewards them with LP tokens. These tokens represent their share of the pool, and they can be redeemed at any time for their proportional value.
When a trade is executed, the exchange takes a percentage of the trade as a fee and distributes it among the LPs based on their share of the pool. The exchange then adjusts the price of the tokens in the pool based on the trading volume and the supply and demand of the tokens.
When the price of one of the tokens in the pool changes dramatically, it can cause impermanent loss. For example, if the price of Token A goes up relative to Token B, LPs will end up with more Token B and fewer Token A. Conversely, if the price of Token A goes down relative to Token B, LPs will end up with more Token A and fewer Token B. This change in token balance causes a loss in value compared to holding the tokens outside of the liquidity pool.
How to Prevent Impermanent Loss
Impermanent loss is a risk that comes with providing liquidity to a DEX, but there are ways to mitigate it. One way is to choose tokens with a similar price range and volatility. For example, providing liquidity to ETH/DAI pair on a DEX might be less risky than providing liquidity to BTC/DAI, as the volatility and price range of ETH and DAI are more similar.
Another way to mitigate impermanent loss is to use impermanent loss protection tools such as those offered by some DEXs. These tools protect LPs from losses caused by large fluctuations in the price of the tokens in the pool. They do this by using hedging mechanisms such as borrowing or lending tokens to reduce the risk of impermanent loss.
Why You Should HODL When Farming Due to Impermanent Loss
Despite the risk of impermanent loss, liquidity provision can be profitable for LPs in the long run. In addition to the trading fees, LPs also receive rewards in the form of governance tokens or other incentives. These rewards can provide significant returns, especially in high-demand liquidity pools.
For this reason, it is important to HODL, or hold on to, the LP tokens received as rewards for liquidity provision. HODLing ensures that the LPs continue to earn rewards and trading fees, which can offset any impermanent losses. Additionally, holding on to the LP tokens can provide opportunities for further trading or staking, which can also generate additional returns.
In conclusion, impermanent loss is a risk that LPs face when providing liquidity to DEXs. However, there are ways to mitigate this risk, such as choosing tokens with similar price ranges and using impermanent loss protection tools. Despite the risk, liquidity provision can be profitable for LPs in the long run, especially if they HODL the LP tokens and continue to earn rewards and trading fees.

PancakeSwap: The Rise of the Binance Smart Chain's Leading DEX
Share:
PancakeSwap
is a
decentralized exchange
(
DEX
) built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) blockchain. It was launched in September 2020 and quickly became one of the most popular DEXs on the Binance Smart Chain due to its user-friendly interface and low fees.
PancakeSwap was created by a group of developers who were part of the Binance community. They noticed that there was a need for a DEX on the Binance Smart Chain that was easy to use and offered low transaction fees. They decided to build PancakeSwap as an alternative to popular DEXs like Uniswap, which runs on the Ethereum blockchain.
The name "PancakeSwap" was inspired by the food industry. The developers wanted to create a platform that was easy to use and fun, like pancakes. The name also reflects the fact that PancakeSwap is a decentralized exchange, where users can swap tokens without the need for a central authority.
The PancakeSwap platform is based on an automated market maker (AMM) system, which uses a mathematical algorithm to determine the price of tokens. This is different from traditional order book exchanges, where buyers and sellers come together to determine the price of assets.
One of the key features of PancakeSwap is its liquidity pools. Users can add liquidity to pools by depositing two tokens, which are then used to create a trading pair. Liquidity providers earn fees on trades that occur in the pool. This incentivizes users to provide liquidity and helps to ensure that there is always enough liquidity for trading.
PancakeSwap also has a native token called CAKE. Users can earn CAKE by staking their tokens in various liquidity pools. CAKE can be used to pay for transaction fees, or it can be traded on other exchanges. The value of CAKE has grown significantly since the launch of PancakeSwap, and it is now one of the most valuable tokens on the Binance Smart Chain.
Since its launch, PancakeSwap has become one of the most popular DEXs on the Binance Smart Chain. It has attracted a large user base due to its low transaction fees, user-friendly interface, and wide range of supported tokens. PancakeSwap has also launched several new features since its launch, including lottery games, a prediction market, and an NFT marketplace.
One of the main advantages of PancakeSwap over other DEXs is its low transaction fees. This is due to the fact that the Binance Smart Chain has much lower fees than the Ethereum blockchain. This has made PancakeSwap a popular choice for traders who want to avoid the high fees associated with other DEXs.
Another advantage of PancakeSwap is its user-friendly interface. The platform is easy to use, even for beginners, and it offers a wide range of tools and features for traders. This has helped to attract a large user base, many of whom are new to cryptocurrency trading.
In conclusion, PancakeSwap has quickly become one of the most popular DEXs on the Binance Smart Chain due to its low transaction fees, user-friendly interface, and wide range of features. Its success has been driven by a group of passionate developers who saw a need for a better DEX on the Binance Smart Chain. As the crypto industry continues to grow and evolve, PancakeSwap is likely to remain a major player in the DEX space.
-------------
HODL Token first listed on PancakeSwap in May 2021 and has seen well over $100,000,000 in volume from this DEX, making it the primary liquidity pool for the token.

Hodling or Day Trading: Choosing the Best Crypto Trading Strategy for You
Share:
Hodling
and
day trading
are two popular cryptocurrency trading strategies that offer different approaches to investing in digital assets. Both strategies have their own advantages and disadvantages, and traders need to carefully evaluate each approach before committing to one. In this article, we will compare the effectiveness and profitability of hodling and day trading to help you choose the best strategy for your investment goals.
Hodling, also known as holding, is a long-term investment strategy where traders purchase a cryptocurrency and hold onto it for an extended period, usually for several months or years. This strategy is based on the belief that the market will continue to grow over time, leading to increased profits. Hodling is ideal for those with a long-term investment horizon and are willing to withstand market fluctuations. One of the main benefits of hodling is that it is a passive approach that requires minimal effort and time. Hodlers do not need to monitor the market frequently or engage in technical analysis, and instead can simply wait for the market to mature and grow.
Day trading, on the other hand, involves buying and selling cryptocurrencies within a single day or a few days, based on market trends and technical analysis. This short-term strategy aims to profit from price movements, and can potentially generate significant returns if done correctly. However, day trading requires a high level of skill, experience, and discipline to minimize risks. Day traders need to constantly monitor the market and engage in technical analysis to identify potential opportunities and risks, and make quick decisions based on market trends.
When it comes to profitability, hodling offers a passive investment approach that does not require constant monitoring or analysis. Instead, it allows traders to ride out market volatility and benefit from the compounding effect over time. In contrast, day trading is an active approach that demands quick decision-making and a deep understanding of market trends, which can lead to significant profits or losses.
Overall, both hodling and day trading have their own advantages and disadvantages, and the choice depends on individual investment goals, risk tolerance, and trading style. Hodling is ideal for those who want a hands-off approach to investing and are willing to wait for the market to mature. Day trading, on the other hand, is suitable for those with a high-risk tolerance and a deep understanding of market trends and technical analysis.
To execute the hodling strategy, traders need to purchase a cryptocurrency and hold onto it for an extended period, ideally for several months or years. Hodling requires patience and a long-term outlook, and traders need to be prepared to withstand market fluctuations and volatility. Hodlers can store their cryptocurrencies in a secure wallet, and simply wait for the market to mature and grow.
To execute the day trading strategy, traders need to monitor the market frequently and engage in technical analysis to identify potential opportunities and risks. Day traders need to have a deep understanding of market trends, and be able to make quick decisions based on market movements. Day trading requires discipline, experience, and a high-risk tolerance.
In conclusion, hodling and day trading are two popular cryptocurrency trading strategies that offer different approaches to investing in digital assets. Both strategies have their own advantages and disadvantages, and traders need to carefully evaluate each approach before committing to one. Hodling is a passive approach that requires patience and a long-term outlook, while day trading is an active approach that demands discipline, experience, and a high-risk tolerance. Ultimately, the choice depends on individual investment goals, risk tolerance, and trading style.

10 Tips for New Cryptocurrency Investors
Share:
Cryptocurrency is a rapidly growing industry that has gained immense popularity in recent years. As more and more people look to invest in
cryptocurrency
, it's important to understand some basic tips for those new to the space. In this article, we'll explore some essential tips that will help newcomers navigate the world of cryptocurrency.
Do Your Research
- Before investing in any cryptocurrency, it's crucial to conduct thorough research. Look for information on the specific currency, the market trends, and the exchanges where you can buy and sell the currency. You can use various online resources to research, including forums, news websites, and social media.
Start Small
- When you're first starting with cryptocurrency, it's best to start small. Invest a small amount of money and test the waters. As you gain experience and knowledge, you can increase your investment. Starting small also helps you to understand the mechanics of buying and selling cryptocurrency without risking too much money.
Diversify
- Your Portfolio Don't put all your eggs in one basket. It's essential to diversify your cryptocurrency portfolio. This means investing in different cryptocurrencies rather than just one. Diversifying helps to spread the risk and minimize losses in case of a market downturn. Consider investing in a mix of well-established and emerging cryptocurrencies.
Keep Your Private Keys Safe
- A private key is a unique code that gives you access to your cryptocurrency wallet. It's crucial to keep your private keys safe because anyone who has access to your private keys can access your wallet and steal your cryptocurrency. Store your private keys in a safe place, such as a hardware wallet or a paper wallet.
Beware of Scams
- The cryptocurrency industry is notorious for scams. Scammers will often use various tactics to lure unsuspecting investors into investing their money in fraudulent schemes. Always be vigilant and do not trust anyone who promises quick returns or guaranteed profits. Research any investment opportunity before investing your money.
Understand Market Volatility
- The cryptocurrency market is highly volatile, meaning that the prices can fluctuate rapidly. Be prepared for market fluctuations and understand that prices can change rapidly. Try not to panic during a market downturn and instead, focus on long-term investments.
Stay Up-to-Date on News
- The cryptocurrency market is always changing, and it's essential to stay up-to-date with the latest news and trends. Follow reputable news sources, social media accounts of industry leaders, and forums to stay informed about changes in the market.
Use a Reliable Exchange
- A cryptocurrency exchange is where you buy and sell cryptocurrency. There are several exchanges to choose from, but not all of them are reliable or trustworthy. Look for a reputable exchange with a good track record and security features. Check user reviews and feedback before making a choice.
Don't Invest More Than You Can Afford to Lose
- Investing in cryptocurrency can be exciting, but it's essential to remember that it's still an investment. Do not invest more money than you can afford to lose. The cryptocurrency market is unpredictable, and there is no guarantee of returns.
Have a Strategy
- It's important to have a strategy when investing in cryptocurrency. Consider factors such as the amount of money you want to invest, the currencies you want to invest in, and your long-term goals. A strategy can help you stay focused and minimize the risk of losing your money.
In conclusion, these tips are essential for anyone new to the cryptocurrency space. By following these tips, you can reduce your risks, avoid scams, and make informed decisions when investing in cryptocurrency. Remember to conduct research, start small, diversify your portfolio, keep your private keys safe, stay up-to-date on news, use a reliable exchange, and have a strategy. With time and experience, you'll become more comfortable navigating the cryptocurrency market.

SafePal, Trust Wallet, and MetaMask: Comparing the Strengths of Top Software Wallets in Crypto
Share:
In the world of cryptocurrency, wallets are one of the most essential tools for managing digital assets. Three of the most popular software wallets in the market today are SafePal, Trust Wallet, and MetaMask. In this article, we will take a closer look at the strengths of each of these wallets.
SafePal
is a hardware and software wallet that offers an all-in-one solution for managing digital assets. One of the standout features of SafePal is its advanced security features, which include two-factor authentication, biometric authentication, and an air-gapped cold storage system. This means that your private keys are stored offline and cannot be accessed by hackers.
Another strength of SafePal is its user-friendly interface. The wallet is designed to be easy to use, even for beginners. It offers a simple and intuitive interface that allows users to quickly and easily manage their digital assets. SafePal also supports over 10,000 different cryptocurrencies, which makes it a versatile choice for anyone looking to manage a wide range of assets.
Trust Wallet
is a mobile software wallet that is designed to be used on iOS and Android devices. It offers a user-friendly interface that is perfect for beginners. Trust Wallet supports a wide range of cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and many more. One of the standout features of Trust Wallet is its integration with decentralized exchanges (DEXs) like Uniswap and PancakeSwap.
This means that users can trade cryptocurrencies directly within the wallet without the need for a centralized exchange. Trust Wallet also offers advanced security features like two-factor authentication and the ability to set up a custom PIN code for added security. Another strength of Trust Wallet is its support for non-fungible tokens (NFTs), which have become increasingly popular in recent months.
MetaMask
is a browser extension wallet that allows users to manage their digital assets directly within their web browser. It supports a wide range of cryptocurrencies and is compatible with popular decentralized applications (dApps) like Uniswap and Compound. One of the strengths of MetaMask is its user interface, which is simple and easy to use.
MetaMask also offers advanced security features like two-factor authentication and the ability to set up a custom passphrase for added security. One of the standout features of MetaMask is its ability to connect to different Ethereum networks, including the Ethereum mainnet, the Ropsten testnet, and many more. This makes it a versatile choice for anyone looking to explore different Ethereum-based projects.
In conclusion, SafePal, Trust Wallet, and MetaMask are all popular software wallets in the world of cryptocurrency. Each of these wallets offers its own unique set of strengths and advantages. SafePal is known for its advanced security features and all-in-one solution for managing digital assets. Trust Wallet is popular for its user-friendly interface and integration with decentralized exchanges. MetaMask is a versatile browser extension wallet that supports a wide range of cryptocurrencies and Ethereum networks.
Ultimately, the choice of which wallet to use will depend on your individual needs and preferences. It is important to do your own research and choose the wallet that best meets your requirements. Regardless of which wallet you choose, it is essential to always follow best practices for security, such as keeping your private keys safe and using two-factor authentication whenever possible. By taking these steps, you can help ensure the safety and security of your digital assets.

Combining a HODLING and Dollar Cost Average (DCA) Strategy
Share:
Dollar-cost averaging (DCA)
is an investment strategy that involves purchasing a fixed dollar amount of a particular asset at regular intervals over time. This approach can be especially useful when investing in cryptocurrency, which is known for its volatility and fluctuations in price.
By using DCA, investors can mitigate the impact of short-term price movements, as they are buying at different prices over time. For example, if an investor were to purchase a large amount of cryptocurrency at one specific time, they may be vulnerable to sudden price drops. However, if they use DCA to spread out their purchases over a longer period, the impact of these fluctuations is reduced.
One way to combine DCA with a
HODLing
strategy is to set up automatic purchases at regular intervals and then hold onto the cryptocurrency for an extended period. HODLing, which is a term that originated in the Bitcoin community, refers to the practice of holding onto cryptocurrency for the long term, rather than actively trading it.
By combining DCA with HODLing, investors can take advantage of the long-term potential of cryptocurrency without being overly concerned with short-term price movements. This approach can be particularly useful for those who believe in the potential of a cryptocurrency over the long term but want to avoid the stress and risk of actively trading.
Another benefit of DCA is that it can help investors avoid the temptation to try to time the market. Trying to predict when the price of a cryptocurrency will rise or fall can be a risky game, and even experienced traders can get it wrong. By using DCA, investors can remove the pressure to try to time the market and instead focus on the long-term potential of their investments.
In summary, DCA can be a powerful tool for investors looking to invest in cryptocurrency, as it helps to reduce the impact of short-term price movements and can be combined with a HODLing strategy to take advantage of the long-term potential of cryptocurrency. By removing the pressure to try to time the market, investors can focus on building a strong, long-term portfolio.

$HODL Contract History
Share:
In this article, we break down the full history of the $HODL contract from its original launch and subsequent migrations.
Note -
$HODL is on its 3rd contract, having originally launched on May 3, 2021
. The tokenomics below are from the launch of $HODL v1. You can see live, up-to-date information on team tokens and burn wallet on the
whitepaper page
.
FOUNDING TOKENOMICS - $HODL v1
V1 Contract Address (Note - this is no longer active): 0x0E3EAF83Ea93Abe756690C62c72284943b96a6Bc
Total Supply: 1 Quadrillion $HODL
4% used for presale and launch. (100% of LP Locked for 6 Months)
5% used for airdrops (Locked until distribution)
The founding team received 1%
4% burnt
CONTRACT HISTORY & TEAM
The
original HODL contract
was launched on May 3, 2021, by the founding developer 'HODLToken'. The v1 token was then migrated to HODL 2.0 by the same developer, with this new contract launching on Jul 22, 2021, to allow the project to introduce a
series of new features
.
V2 Contract Address (Note - this is no longer active): 0x5788105375ecf7f675c29e822fd85fcd84d4cd86
The process of migration required holders to swap their tokens via the HODL website due to the LP locks in place on $HODL 2.0. The migration window for v1 to 2.0 closed in October 2021 after many months of being opened.
A new team took over the project and migrated to a 3rd
proxy/upgradable HODL contract
on Nov 10, 2021, led by Jeff Gilden as CEO, with the original developer exiting the project. The migration was executed by an automated airdrop on a 1:1 basis, requiring no input from holders.
On Apr 27, 2022, Adam Roberts, former HODL CMO/COO took the role of CEO with Jeff Gilden moving to the role of CMO and Chairman (visit our
team page
to meet the HODL team).
On
November 10, 2021
, we migrated to a new contract at:
0x0E9766dF73973abCfEDDE700497c57110ee5c301
This was a 1:1 migration from the V2 contract.
On
December 12, 2024
, we moved to the
current and final contract
:
0x32b407ee915432be6d3f168bc1eff2a6f8b2034c
This contract introduced a
new total supply of 10 billion tokens
.
As a result, while holders were migrated automatically, the number of tokens received was reduced in line with the lower supply. However, the
value of holdings was preserved
, reflecting the updated tokenomics and supporting long-term growth.
Due to the nature of the blockchain, certain platforms still list the old contracts, however, we've gone to great lengths to remove as much of this information or to add migration notices to reduce any potential confusion.
If your wallet does not show the new tokens, please add the final contract manually.
This is the
only active $HODL contract
going forward.

Why Invest into HODL?
Share:
Article source:
https://hodltoken.net/resources/why-invest-into-hodl
$HODL is the longest-serving and highest paying $BNB reward token in the history of crypto, underpinned by an incredible brand and a complete passive income ecosystem.
#HODL is a passive income ecosystem built on The Binance Smart Chain Network (BSC). Our ground-breaking contract delivers a revolutionary mechanism to #BSC ecosystem: Earn sustainable $BNB and reflections just by holding. Not only that but our token is underpinned by the greatest brand name in crypto and a series of innovative products that our holders can enjoy in order to generate more passive income. At HODL we believe in a future where personal finance is more lucrative, fair, and sustainable for all. HODL is more than a token; it is a platform and community making it easy for anyone to make money by investing in cryptocurrency. Our innovative ecosystem and initiatives are strategically chosen to ensure sustainable income for our holders. Here are some of the key features of our ecosystem:
$BNB rewards
Reflections
Reward stacking
Sustainable reward pool
Automatic LP generation
Manual and automated token burns
Anti-dump mechanism
Anti-flip mechanism
Tax-free tokens when reinvesting
Upgradable proxy contract
Market-leading brand
Advanced dashboard
Innovative products and utility
NFTs sales revenue
NFT staking pool
Revenue generation from CEXs
Our own DEX and reward token - HODLX
Gaming and play-to-earn
Betting games with earnings to our reward pool
Burn Lottery
Our own meaningful charity
Tokens worth holding
HODL to earn. Built smart for the future, HODL is a community-driven DeFi project built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). HODL is revolutionary and constantly innovating to drive more rewards and value to all holders. It was the first project to reward its holders with BNB and reflections just for holding and has set the record for the biggest payouts of all time. At the heart of $HODL is a highly-innovative smart contract which captures tax revenues from buys, sells and transfers of the token. Our sell bot liquifies these tokens converting them into BNB and then places the funds into the reward pool. By holding $HODL you can collect your share of the reward pool every 7-days and will be sent reflections throughout.
Taxes worth paying
Engineered to be sustainable and taxes you will love with each transaction; be it a buy, sell, or transfer, $HODL collects a 10% tax to fund a $BNB reward pool to sustainably grow its rewards. Our capped reward pool means your rewards are protected even if volume dips, and are amplified in times of growth. As long as you hold, you will be collecting rewards.
5% of the value of all buys is sent to the $BNB reward pool. All holders can access their share of the $BNB reward pool every 7-days!
2% of the value of all buys is sent to holders in the form of $HODL tokens. Reflections are sent continually, so your token balance is constantly growing!
2% of the value of all buys is sent to the PancakeSwap liquidity pool, increasing the price stability and ensuring that anyone who wishes to cash out can access their funds.
1% Burn Lottery. Simply buy 10 Billion or more $HODL Tokens using PancakeSwap or the HODL DEX and you will see your ticket in the official HODL Telegram group! The winning ticket will receive all tokens in the lottery pool, with the remaining 30% burned, making HODL hyper-deflationary!
Investments worth reinvesting
With HODL reward or reinvest options, you have the power to make your rewards work for you; reinvest your rewards into additional $HODL, claim $BNB rewards directly back into your wallet, or request a combination of both - every 7-days.
Reward pool worth sustaining
The BNB reward pool uses an adjustable cap to ensure it is sustainable, safeguarding rewards when volume decreases and creating a sustainable and long-term source of passive income for all holders.
HODLers worth protecting
With the anti-dump mechanism, there is a maximum sell amount of 250B $HODL tokens, per address, per 24 hours in order to reduce the impact of excessive dumps and support the underlying principle of HODLing for maximum gains.
Rewards worth stacking
$HODL Stack is the market-leading reward stacking technology, allowing small investors to stack their rewards to ensure their claims exceed the network costs
Exchange worth farming
HODLX.exchange is a totally decentralized exchange with staking pools and farms where you can stake $HODL, our DEX reward token $HODLX, and earn $HODL, $HODLX, or partner tokens!
NFT’s worth minting
HODLhands are set to turn heads in the NFT space, you'll be able to stake them to earn $HODL/$HODLX, access boosted APRs, access play to earn and more! We also have mythical NFT's that we offer a one time reward for minting.
Performance worth charting
HODLdash.io dedicated dashboard is the best investor dashboard in #DeFi, allowing you to view the performance of your investment, earnings, and key project information!
Games worth playing
HODLgames.net is a simple DeFi Gaming Network integrated into the HODL Ecosystem. We are bringing fresh games in every few weeks and we have only just begun.
Odds worth betting
With HODLbet you can currently enjoy two fun games - coin toss and rangefinder - with bets available in both $HODL and our reward token $HODLX, with fees from gaming, are sent to the $BNB reward pool too! More HODLbet games are coming in the future.
Merchandise worth wearing
During the rise or the fall together we HODL! Encourage others to HODL and spread the word with a conversation starter. HODLstore.io has beautiful merchandise for all HODLers.
Coins worth collecting
-(Sorry, we are currently sold out)- Bronze, silver, or gold? Own a piece of crypto history, earn tokens, and support the community. Each beautiful first-edition physical coin purchase also earns you tax-free HODLtokens, from $2K - $10K. All funds raised support the project and the BNB rewards pools for all HODLers.
Charity worth supporting
HODLforward's mission is to help feed those in need by leveraging $HODL's passive income generation. At its heart, HODL is about community. Our rewards are rooted in the actions and choices of our community members. HODLforward is the way we can share and give back to an even larger community in need. HODL is here to stay; we built our token to bring the benefits of the blockchain and passive income to the masses. The longevity, growth, and security of our HODLers investments are at the core of all the choices we make.

Why Buy Into The HODL Ecosystem
Share:
Why Buy HODL?  What makes us stand out in the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) cryptocurrency space?
HODL Token was created to operate on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) Network over a year ago in May of 2021 as a dual-reward system offering both BNB rewards and reflections to its investors (HODLers).  It was simple and straightforward but has evolved into an amazing ecosystem with a multitude of opportunities to earn passive income.
Over the past year, the growth and accomplishments of HODL have been astounding.  There have been very successful changes in development and ownership.  This has enabled progression into our third contract which happens to be a proxy contract.  This will allow certain aspects and needs to be modified without creating a new immutable contract, meaning the need for migration is no longer an issue.  Migrating, airdrops and mass confusion tend to shroud growth when it comes to moving to a new contract within a cryptocurrency project.  HODL has solved those issues.
Team members are Doxxed and can be found on the website portal. This means there are photos, names, and some personal information about ownership and support within our HODL project. Most projects hide behind anonymity and mystery, but HODL has chosen to be open, honest, and transparent.  The team at HODL is proud of who they are!
HODL’s ecosystem and newly created Decentralized Exchange (HODLX “the simple” DEX) currently supports both HODL and HODLX project tokens and provides its own Yield Farming, Staking, HODL Hand NFTs, games, BNB earned rewards and reflection earnings.  A quick review of the roadmap on hodltoken.net shows that more development and forward progression is imminent.
HODL is listed on various Centralized Exchanges, also Coin Market Cap, CoinGecko, etc.
HODL is on a multitude of social media platforms including Telegram, Facebook, Twitter, Discord, Instagram, and YouTube, and is always looking to expand. The main telegram group contains over 15,000 members and a BSC network search shows an excess of 26,000 wallets, which are referred to as HODLers or HODL Investors.  All-around membership continues to grow across its platforms.

How to Deal With Uncertainty in the Notoriously Volatile Crypto Space
Share:
Investing in crypto is a little like getting on a roller coaster with a blindfold on—plenty of unforeseen ups and downs make the ride exciting and scary at the same time. With crypto, however, real money is at stake, which can make the downs far more frightening than a sudden plunge on an amusement park ride.
So, for those of us who believe crypto is here to stay (both as a practical, digital currency format and as an investment vehicle), how can we invest wisely, without fear, and in a way that is sustainable? Most of this comes down to using diversification, planning/automation, and longer time horizons in order to remove emotion from the equation.
Spoiler alert—the ideas in this article probably won’t appeal to risk-hungry swing traders or those aiming to time the market and cash in on a lump-sum investment that directly precedes a moonshot.
Diversification
Diversification is a broad term, and it means different things in different investment circles. Here, we’re talking about diversification within an investor’s crypto portfolio specifically.
But, before we dive into that, it’s worth mentioning that even though it seems highly likely that crypto is here to stay (after all, hundreds of governments, businesses, celebrities, and even professional fund managers have bought into the scene), it is never wise to put all of your eggs in a single basket—especially when thinking about retirement. So, before diversifying your crypto portfolio, be sure that your savings include other asset classes (e.g., cash, stocks, fixed-income investments, real estate, etc.) as well.
Now, back to crypto—as we all know, new coins and projects emerge all the time, and for every few that launch skyward, there are countless others that plummet into obscurity and never end up grabbing much market share.
So, first and foremost, investors interested in long-term growth should make sure they have exposure not just to many different coins, but to many different kinds of coins. Let’s take a look at a hypothetical, well-diversified crypto portfolio:
30% large-cap, mainstream currencies (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, etc.)
20% native tokens for popular platforms (e.g., Binance Coin)
20% small and mid-cap coins with good use cases that you believe in (your choice)
10% interest-earning stablecoins (e.g., USDCoin, [fill in the blank], etc.)
10% staking rewards coins (e.g., Cardano, Polkadot, etc.)
10% passive income coins (e.g., HODL token)
A great way to hedge against inflation is to buy
HODL
and stake it on the
HODLX
exchange. You can stake your HODL to earn a high yield interest in the form of HODLX tokens. You can use those earned tokens to stake, sell, or a combination of both. It’s a great strategy to make your tokens work for you to earn even more.
With a well-diversified crypto portfolio, you can cash in on massive price surges in the major coins while also collecting staking rewards, reflections, interest, and other income by holding income-oriented coins during lulls and downtime. You can also dedicate a portion of your portfolio to projects you really love and believe in. If they blow up, so will a portion of your portfolio!
Just as important, if one sector of your portfolio plummets, you won’t lose it all. Big coins like BTC and ETH are good safety bets since they are well known, have large user bases, and are highly liquid and thus easy to trade. Coins that allow you to earn by holding—whether through staking, interest, or reflections, can also help offset temporary losses you may incur if some of the tokens in your portfolio lose value quickly.
Planning and Automation
Everyone needs enough money for their day-to-day and month-to-month expenses, and many of us like to have some extra cash on hand for emergencies. That’s just good planning. This money is not for investing in crypto.
Your crypto investment funds should come out of any discretionary income you have after expenses, emergency fund contributions, spending money, and savings. So, let’s say you have an extra $100 a month and you want to invest it in crypto. The best way to do this as a long-term growth-oriented investor is to use dollar-cost averaging to automate your investments and avoid emotional decisions.
Watching the crypto market is stressful, and emotion-based moves like panic selling and FOMO buying have decimated the portfolios of many starry-eyed DeFi enthusiasts. Instead of reacting rashly to every Elon Musk tweet or viral Reddit post on r/crypto, consider turning a blind eye to the news and sticking to a plan.
First, design your portfolio. You can use the allocation example above and then change out categories and percentages to fit your goals and preferences. Figure what percentage of your portfolio you would like to have allocated to each coin you’re interested in. Set up automatic investments on your app/platform of choice, and invest the same amount every month (or every week) in the same coins at the same proportions. This way, you’ll buy more of each asset when it’s cheaper and less of each asset when it’s more expensive.
If you trust your portfolio in the long term, dollar-cost averaging is a great way to avoid letting short-term price swings convince you to kick your well-laid plans to the curb and make an emotional trading decision.
Longer Time Horizons
No one knows when or how quickly any particular crypto asset is going to go up in value, but as the crypto space gains more and more traction in mainstream finance, most believe that higher highs are on the horizon. Cathie Wood, manager of Ark Invest, predicts that Bitcoin could hit $1 million by 2030. Whatever the case may be, digital currency is useful, and the blockchain has countless applications both inside and outside of the realms of finance, so the realm of DeFi technology probably isn’t going away any time soon.
That being said, it can take a long time for an investment to pay off. How long? When it comes to crypto, we don’t really have enough historical data to make predictions with any degree of certainty. That’s why hanging in there for the long haul is likely your best bet in terms of solid gains. The more people and companies adopt crypto, the more a well-diversified crypto portfolio is likely to appreciate in value.
Getting rich quick by dumping one’s life savings into a single project could be the thrill of a lifetime, but if you’re not looking to lay your livelihood on the line for a minuscule chance of a lottery-like payoff, the best way to get in on the action is probably to balance risk with reward, keep emotions out of the equation, and hang in there for the long haul. Keep adding to your positions, stay informed, add or remove projects and tokens from your bullpen as needed, and watch your digital savings grow slowly but surely. Good luck!

How to Dollar Cost Average (DCA)
Share:
How To Dollar Cost Average (DCA) With Crypto
DCA is a less demanding and time-consuming tool for investing slowly and consistently. In other words, it will prevent any negative effect on an investment caused by short-term market instability. The goal is to take advantage of the downturns without compromising too much capital at once.
How DCA Works
With dollar-cost averaging, first, you will determine the total quantity you are expecting to invest, along with your preferred investment product(s) — stocks, crypto, commodities, etc. Afterward, instead of investing a significant amount of money all at once, you will fund it in smaller equal installments over a specific period.
Once set up, your profit will happen automatically, regardless of asset price or activity in the market. If the cost of an investment drops when you are dollar-cost averaging, you will probably get some earnings if the price moves back up.
On the other hand, committing to dollar-cost averaging means that, sometimes, you’ll be investing when the market or a particular asset has lowered in value. Suppose you choose to buy when the others are selling; a DCA strategy can potentially help you obtain the benefits of buying low and selling high, especially if you’re not a professional market watcher.
How do you use DCA in crypto?
It is essential to know that cryptocurrencies can be pretty volatile, even more than stocks. That being said, using DCA for crypto can be a suitable method. Summing up, this strategy will establish an order for a regular acquisition on a cryptocurrency exchange.
Even if you just entered the crypto market, you comprehend that you can generate a potentially greater profit from buying during dips and selling at the top. But, this approach also comes with greater risks and instability.
There’s overall unanimity that DCA is a safer primary method. It has lower risks and lower rewards but still offers the chance of profiting from market swings. So, if you want a relatively safe form of benefiting from crypto’s volatility, a dollar-cost averaging strategy is worth considering. You can also use this methodology for Ethereum, Binance coin, Ripple, etc.
For example, suppose you choose to invest a fixed amount of $150. If you spend $150 to buy a fraction of Bitcoin in your first month and keep investing that same number monthly; you will notice that it will be possible to purchase more Bitcoins during some months because of price volatility.
Another essential factor is to dedicate some time to research and analyze the proper asset to invest in. The Dollar-cost averaging only works when you keep funding one particular crypto.

A Brief History of the Word HODL
Share:
"HODL," is a term repeatedly used in the cryptocurrency world, created years ago from a typo. It's also typically come to stand for "hold on for dear life" among crypto investors.
Cryptocurrency is a kind of digital currency backed by blockchain technology. It works as a form of dealings and can also be kept as an asset or investment. The main feature and advantage of cryptocurrency is decentralization since it is not administered by a unique central source such as a country's central bank. Some examples of cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, etc.
2013 was a big year for Bitcoin. The price rushed from $15 in January of that year to over $1,100 at the beginning of December, which gave a return of 7,230%. In addition to it, in that same month, a drunken user posted an entry titled "I AM HODLING" in a bitcoin forum; the post was loaded with typos and phrases in all caps.
Take a look at the original post:
"I AM HODLING"
"I type d that tyitle twice because I knew it was wrong the first time. Still wrong. w/e," WHY AM I HOLDING? I'LL TELL YOU WHY, It's because I'm a bad trader and I KNOW I'M A BAD TRADER. Yeah you good traders can spot the highs and the lows pit pat piffy wing wong wang just like that and make a millino bucks sure no problem bro."
GameKyuubi
was the author.
The typo "HODL" started to circulate between the crypto community and soon became the internet slang to point out when a person holds bitcoin rather than sells it. Later, the term was extended to include other cryptocurrencies.
"Hodling" became some of the most popular cryptocurrency slang and also served as an uncomplicated strategy for traders, given the volatile essence of the crypto market. This method enables investors to avoid the loss from the short-term volatility of cryptocurrencies and gain returns from long-term value growth. Although the "hodling" part is theoretically less risky than trading, investors still need to evaluate the risk of laws and regulation changes and the public's viewpoint.
For cryptocurrency extremists, HODL symbolizes more than a method for escape from FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt), FOMO (Fear of Missing Out), and other profit-eroding feelings. Long-term crypto HODLers remain loyal to it because they think that cryptocurrencies will someday substitute government-related currencies as the foundation of all economic systems.

Keanu Reeves – “I have a little HODL”
Share:
You've probably heard about NFTs and have an opinion about them, but if not, here is a quick explanation; the non-fungible tokens allow users to possess rare digital artifacts through the blockchain network that supports cryptocurrencies.
During a recent interview with The Verge, the Canadian actor Keanu Reeves expressed some disbelief about non-fungible tokens (NFTs) while discussing the upcoming Matrix NFTs from Warner Bros.
Warner Bros. Pictures has been engaged in the crypto area, launching a series of 100,000 NFTs to promote the movie's launch in November. The NFTs are Matrix-themed avatars, and they are being sold for $50 per token. Each one gives the holders the chance to choose between taking the red or blue pill, mirroring one of the film's most significant moments.
"I have a little HODL." - Keanu Reeves
It all began when Alex Heath asked the actors if any of them was "into cryptocurrency personally," and Keanu said a friend bought him some a while ago, but he hasn't used it yet. The interviewer explained that this action is called a HODL, and Reeves replied, "I have a little HODL." The actor also expressed his thoughts about NFTs, pointing out that even though they cannot be copied, someone can easily reproduce them.
He is not against decentralized technologies like crypto or metaverse, but thinks that Facebook did not come up with the concept. He says that the whole idea is way older. As a matter of fact, the term "metaverse" was initially created back in the 1990s in a piece by Neal Stephenson called "Snow Crash."
